channel.title: Comments on: 10 most inspiring designs from October 2011

item.title: By: Web Design Lancaster
item.dc:creator: Web Design Lancaster
item.description:
The Warchild site instantly sends shivers down my spine.
No better compliment of the design for a very difficult issue.
item.content:encoded:
The Warchild site instantly sends shivers down my spine.

No better compliment of the design for a very difficult issue.

item.title: By: Web Design Leeds
item.dc:creator: Web Design Leeds
item.description: nice article, I personally like the zoo advertising design. Its a creative approach for home page design.
